programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> -odac </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 16 nchnls = 1 0dbfs = 1
;; example written by joachim heintz 2009
instr 1 ipermut = p4; 1 = change order of soundfiles ifftsize = 1024 ioverlap = ifftsize / 4 iwinsize = ifftsize iwinshape = 1; von-Hann window Sfile1 = "fox.wav" Sfile2 = "wave.wav" ain1 soundin Sfile1 ain2 soundin Sfile2 fftin1 pvsanal ain1, ifftsize, ioverlap, iwinsize, iwinshape; fft-analysis of file 1 fftin2 pvsanal ain2, ifftsize, ioverlap, iwinsize, iwinshape; fft-analysis of file 2 ktrans linseg 0, p3, 1; linear transition if ipermut == 1 then fcross pvscross fftin2, fftin1, ktrans, 1-ktrans else fcross pvscross fftin1, fftin2, ktrans, 1-ktrans endif aout pvsynth fcross out aout endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> i 1 0 2.757 0; frequencies from fox. wav; amplitudes moving from wave to fox i 1 3 2.757 1; frequencies from wave.wav, amplitudes moving from fox to wave e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
